alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 22 at 6:51AM AKDT until May 22 at 11:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS FOR PALMER AND THE KNIK RIVER VALLEY... The National Weather Service in Anchorage has issued a Red Flag Warning FOR HOT DRY AND WINDY CONDITIONS, which is in effect from 2 PM this afternoon to 11 PM AKDT this evening. * Winds...Southwest 10 to 15 mph. Gusts to 25 mph in the afternoon and evening. * Timing...2 PM this afternoon to 11 PM AKDT this evening. Worst conditions late afternoon through early evening. * Relative Humidity...As low as 18 percent. * Temperatures...64 to 68. * Location...Palmer and along the Knik River Valley. * Impacts...Rapid ignition, growth and spread of fires will be possible.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
